short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a person's PvP tier from mctiers.com on their NameMC profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When on namemc, this will display both any tiers that that player has on mctiers.com, but it will also display their badges next to their name and their overall ranking.
